participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nostalgic, with a playful side.
participant_1.background: I cherish my dog's ashes. I play games at the arcade, still. I got married to my high school friend. I'm from a small town in the Midwest. My favorite food is spicy tex mex.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and outgoing, with a passion for the arts.
participant_2.background: I listened to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my last birthday. I love sushi. I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete. I visit India often. I like to draw and paint because it helps me express myself.

content.text: I'm doing well. I'm from a small town in the Midwest. What about you?
I'm from a city, but I visit India often. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play games at the arcade and I love spicy tex mex. What about you?
I love sushi and I like to draw and paint. I also listen to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my birthday.
That's really cool! I'm not very artistic, but I do like to read.
I love to read, too! What are some of your favorite books?
I really like the Harry Potter series. I also like the Lord of the Rings series.
Those are both great series! I've read them both several times.
Me too! I'm a big fan of fantasy novels.
Me too! I also like science fiction novels.
I've never read any science fiction novels. What are some good ones?
I really like the Ender's Game series by Orson Scott Card. It's a classic.
I'll have to check that out. Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome! I hope you like it.
